objects.specification: A flat horizontal floor surface made of smooth light gray vinyl tiles with subtle texture, designed for durability, easy cleaning, and a warm, bright atmosphere.
A tall rectangular wall painted in a soft cream color with a smooth plaster finish, designed to support mounted items such as a blackboard, projector, and educational posters.
A tall rectangular wall painted in a soft cream color with a smooth plaster finish, ideal for displaying educational posters and notice boards.
A tall rectangular side wall painted in a soft cream color with a smooth plaster finish, featuring windows and curtains for natural light and decoration.
A tall rectangular side wall painted in a soft cream color with a smooth plaster finish, supporting tall bookshelves filled with educational materials.

A large rectangular desk made of dark walnut wood with a smooth polished surface, featuring a sturdy frame, two side drawers, and a central knee space. It has a rich dark wood tone finish with pronounced grain, perfectly suited for instructor use.

A large rectangular blackboard covering most of the front wall, colored in deep green with a matte finish, featuring thin white horizontal writing lines evenly spaced across the surface and encased in a slim aluminum frame.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a sleek white plastic housing and rounded edges, featuring a central lens at the front, multiple ventilation grilles on the sides, and a small digital display, designed for high-resolution projection onto the blackboard.

A tall sturdy wooden bookshelf in a dark walnut finish, with multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted hardcover books, binders, and educational materials. It has a closed back and clean modern lines.

A tall sturdy wooden bookshelf in a dark walnut finish, with multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted hardcover books, binders, and educational materials. It has a closed back and clean modern lines.
A round wall clock with a thin black metal frame, a white face featuring bold black numerals, and two slender black hands. It is designed for clear visibility from anywhere in the room.
A large rectangular window with a slender white frame and clear glass panes, letting in ample natural light and providing an open view to the outside.
A large rectangular window with a slender white frame and clear glass panes, letting in ample natural light and providing an open view to the outside.
A soft semi-transparent light cream-colored curtain with gentle vertical folds, hanging from a slim white curtain rod above the window and adding a warm, cozy touch.
A soft semi-transparent light cream-colored curtain with gentle vertical folds, hanging from a slim white curtain rod above the window and adding a warm, cozy touch.
A colorful educational poster printed on matte paper featuring vibrant graphics and illustrative diagrams, framed with a thin white border for classroom display.
A colorful educational poster printed on matte paper featuring vibrant graphics and illustrative diagrams, framed with a thin white border for classroom display.
A medium-sized potted plant with glossy green leaves arranged in a simple white ceramic pot with a round shape and subtle texture, adding a touch of natural greenery.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of durable gray plastic with an open top for easy disposal, designed for classroom use.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of durable gray plastic with an open top for easy disposal, designed for classroom use.

A sturdy rectangular table crafted from light oak wood with a smooth laminated tabletop, featuring slightly rounded corners and four straight legs. The surface displays subtle grain patterns in a light wood tone, designed to seat one student comfortably in an educational setting.
